channel.title: Posts on All Articles
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on All Articles

item.title: Control Magic
item.description: Control Magic Rules of spells. These spells are taken 1 for 1 from DND. A link to the DND spell will be included. The At higher levels mechanic is ignored, the Components mechanic is ignored, and the Level mechanic is ignored. The essence cost will always be listed. Cantrips are listed first, followed by all the other spells. Cantrips are simple spells that you may use with only a little understanding of essence.
